name: Greedy Dungeon (itch)
description:
A puzzle top-down 2D top-down survival score game made for Ludum Dare 40.

The game was made with the Ludum Dare theme in mind, which was
"The more you have, the worse it is."

Update Log:

(8/12/2017 v0.2)

> Fixed: Score did not reset after a play-through.

> Fixed: Tutorial did not reset when player's Health reaches 0

> Altered hitbox size for player, decreasing the size to take damage at only the feet (the blue part of the player)

> Tutorial design layout changed to accommodate players to reverse movement penalty.
